Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Requires restaurants and persons authorized to sell alcoholic beverages to have tangible menus available upon request
Summary: Requires restaurants and persons authorized to sell alcoholic beverages to have tangible menus available upon request.
LawCode: Add ยง396-uu, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to requiring restaurants and persons authorized to sell alcoholic beverages to have tangible menus available upon request
